t: Little, Brown and Company - Wikipedia
s: 1 week ago - In October 2018, Little, Brown announced an imprint dedicated to illustrated books with Michael Szczerban as vice president and editorial director. The Voracious imprint launched in fall 2019 and has published works by Accidentally Wes Anderson, Ayesha Curry, Vivian Howard, Christopher Kimball's Milk Street, Marcus Samuelsson, and Pete Souza, among others. In February 2020, Hachette Book Group acquired 1,000 titles for young readers ...
